title: Sugar Monster - Hop Eat n Play
creator: epollomes

extendedInfo.description: Meet Nino, the Sugar Monster. Nino is a little mutant bouncy creature that loves to hop, eat luscious sweets and play. The bouncing adventure takes him over four different worlds: Candy, Chocolate, Cookies and Donut Worlds; during the adventure he encounters members of the mini monstrous gang, trying to block his way. Your goal in the main game is to bounce from the start and reach the finish without being hit or falling off the platform. Beat the levels to unlock the power-ups, such as the super double jump and the Jet engine, to help Nino overcome the obstacles and the enemies! That's not all! When the sugar monster is not jumping around, he is playing the in app games! Help him out to collect coins and buy the power-ups from the shop! The game is totally free, no money involved, no in app purchases, use the virtual coins collected in the game and the integrated mini in-app games, to buy the power-ups.Features: - 128 free levels over 4 different worlds, the latter can be played separately, 32 levels in each - 10 easy levels in each world to help beginners improve their skills and the game advances to more skilled levels - Cool distinctive graphics per world and smooth physics simulation - Unique Music composed for each world and in-app mini game - Upgrades and power-ups for the sugar monster, with power-up hints to know when to upgrade - 6 addicting in-app mini games integrated in the game  - Designed to look good on low and high end devices (incl. tablets), and fast performance on the low end cheap devices - Leader boards for the in-app games so that you can share, brag and challenge your friends ( With possibility for anonymous login, no need for private info sharing)Download now this new free game for android and beat the monstrosity gang! Thanks for checking the game ! Please If by any chance the game doesn't start, kindly consider restarting your phone and trying again.--Sugar Monster is powered by AndEngine, and is ad supported but no ads during game play : )Hint: And for the loyal fans who read this far : ) here's a tip: for faster progress in the game, you should play each level in the 4 worlds before moving into the following level, that is to unlock the power-ups faster and stay in the same difficulty level.

reviews.title: 5 games in one!
reviews.comment: Lots of content, something for everyone. Main game is a platform jumper with tons of levels and upgrades to unlock. Mini games include a Mastermind type game (an old favorite of mine!) and tetris type donut stacking game. Brings me back to NES days!
reviews.author: Keegan Adcock

reviews.title: Simple but hard
reviews.comment: My favorite games are the ones that combine simplicity and difficulty. This is one of those games and it\'s a blast! The mini games are icing on the cake.

reviews.comment: Good

reviews.title: Epic!
reviews.comment: This is one epic game ! The permission are minmum so you know the developers are not crap...and they developed their own custom mini games system instead of third parties... I expect top free in no time !
reviews.author: V Ve

reviews.title: Amusing and Worth Playing + DELICIOUS
reviews.comment: Interesting game for candy lovers like me especially when im hungry.  The only game which can relieve my HUNGER pain :). Music really great , with so much granularity at each level . No bugs and smooth playing throughout the game. Hardwork of the developer apparent to the endusers. SO  GREAT JOB OVERALL and WELL Done
reviews.author: Asma Farhat

reviews.title: Full gaming console!
reviews.comment: This game contains many minigames and altogether it\'s more like a whole console than a single game. Every minigame is challenging and entertaining and helps you in the main game - great concept! Nice graphics and music, well done!
